transcript: Oh, thank you, dear. And the same goes for you, except that if I so much see you looking at another woman, I'll kill you.

segments.text: Oh, thank you, dear. And the same goes for you, except that if I so much see you looking at another woman, I'll kill you.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Oh, thank you dear.  And the same goes for you except that if I so much as see you looking at another woman, I'll kill you.
